Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN INSERT INTO dbo.Readings ([sensorId],[appartmentId], [value],[timestamp]) SELECT [sensorId],[appartmentId], [value],[timestamp] FROM @Readings
END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT Readings.value, Sensorcharacteristics.unit, Readings.timestamp, Readings.appartmentId FROM Readings INNER JOIN Sensorcharacteristics ON Sensorcharacteristics.sensorId = Readings.sensorId WHERE appartmentId = @param1 RETURN

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: ( SELECT Readings.value, Sensorcharacteristics.unit, Readings.timestamp, Readings.appartmentId FROM Readings INNER JOIN Sensorcharacteristics ON Sensorcharacteristics.sensorId = Readings.sensorId WHERE appartmentId = @param1 )

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @LogString VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @LogString1 VARCHAR(100) SELECT @LogString= (SELECT 'ReadingId: ' + cast(ReadingId as varchar) + ' SensorId: '+ cast(sensorId as varchar) +' AppartmentId: '+ cast(appartmentId as varchar) +' Value: '+ cast(value as varchar) +' Timestamp: ' + cast(timestamp as varchar) From deleted) SELECT @LogString1= (SELECT 'ReadingId: ' + cast(ReadingId as varchar) + ' SensorId: '+ cast(sensorId as varchar) +' AppartmentId: '+ cast(appartmentId as varchar) +' Value: '+ cast(value as varchar) +' Timestamp: ' + cast(timestamp as varchar) From inserted) Insert into dbo.LogTable(Operation, LogEntry, LogEntry2) VALUES ('Updated',@LogString,@LogString1); END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[Trigger_Readings] ON [dbo].[Readings] FOR UPDATE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @LogString VARCHAR(100) SELECT @LogString= (SELECT 'ReadingId: ' + cast(ReadingId as varchar) + ' SensorId: '+ cast(sensorId as varchar) +' AppartmentId: '+ cast(appartmentId as varchar) +' Value: '+ cast(value as varchar) +' Timestamp: ' + cast(timestamp as varchar) From deleted) Insert into dbo.LogTable(Operation, LogEntry) VALUES ('Deleted',@LogString); END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[Trigger_Readings_1] ON [dbo].[Readings] FOR DELETE AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @LogString1 VARCHAR(100) SELECT @LogString1= (SELECT 'ReadingId: ' + cast(ReadingId as varchar) + ' SensorId: '+ cast(sensorId as varchar) +' AppartmentId: '+ cast(appartmentId as varchar) +' Value: '+ cast(value as varchar) +' Timestamp: ' + cast(timestamp as varchar) From inserted) Insert into dbo.LogTable(Operation, LogEntry2) VALUES ('Inserted',@LogString1); END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[Trigger_Readings_2] ON [dbo].[Readings] FOR INSERT AS
